column4: An error occurred in the io-library ('Could not claim the USB device'): Could not claim interface 0 (Operation not permitted).  Make sure no other program or kernel module (such as sdc2xx, stv680, spca50x) is using the device and you have read/write access to the device.
which hardware? maybe you need to add yourself to an specific group
My digicam, which worked fine before the upgrade to Feisty yesterday.  I've had that error before, ages ago, but don't remember when or how I fixed it.  It might have been when I upgraded to Edgy
